data.title: Boggs Natural Gas, Flp
data.meta_description: Boggs Natural Gas, Flp summary data for production in the state of West Virginia. MineralAnswers collects and tracks information for BOGGS NATURAL GAS, FLP
data.text:
Boggs Natural Gas, Flp is currently un-ranked in the state of West Virginia based on a total production of 73,325 barrel of oil equivalent (BOE) reported during the month of 12-01-2021. The company has an estimated daily production of 0 BBLs oil and 0 MCF of gas, coming from 0 actively producing wells in the state.

There are no permits filed with the state that Boggs Natural Gas, Flp can drill in the future.
